_header: Today sprang bloom of Jesse his root
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; Virgin Mary, life of
_description: Gospel, ‘In natiuitate beate marie virginis’, in one MS of the Northern Homily Cycle

HunHM129.First Lines:
To day sprange blome of Iesse is roteAnd wox to wand to man is
                    bote…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Þat may we here by a tale wytAnd ȝyff ȝe will
                    I will tell hyt
